value:
Everywhere I turn here... More
Heroes... More legends... I want to
spar with them all!

I really want to become a great
sword master like my mother and
uncle before me. And I will.

Good work on your patrols! I should
learn from your example and go
train extra hard with my sword.

Now, prepare yourself to—!$k$pWhat? I was just getting ready to
practice with my sword!

Hyaaaa! Hyaaaa! Hya—?!$k$pOh! You might want to stand back
while I'm practicing, all right?

Now, prepare yourself to—! Oh!
It's you! I've come bearing a hello
from $Nf.

One step closer to being a
sword master!

I need to keep this up. It makes
a difference!

I'll never surpass my mother or
uncle at this rate.

I'll do my best to bloom using this
power!

I'm Fir! I aspire to master the sword
and travel all over to find sparring
partners. Please spar with me!

I've fought and sparred, and
sparred and fought, pretty much
constantly since I got here.$k$pI think I'm nearer to mastering the
sword, but I have to say that you've
taught me something new.$k$pYou've shown me that strength isn't
just about blades and battles,
$Nu.$k$pIt takes far greater strength to
want to protect others and
keep the peace—as you do.$k$pI would like to stay by your side
and continue learning what
strength truly is.$k$pYou seem to be great at so many
things—not just tactics. I look forward
to learning from the master!
はっ！
やぁっ！
きゃああっ！
Thi-...can't be...
I will have my victory!
Don't you hold back!
The path of the sword!
Face my blade!
It's over...
Heehee
My turn now?
You know, I'm not really the sort that's good with teasing.
Please spar with me.
I defend myself well with my sword. But you know? I never see a lie coming.
I will be a master of the sword. You can count on that.
I hope to be every bit as good as my mother someday.
I know I'll get plenty of training—long as I stick with you.
Yes?
Let's go.
Where to?
